translations: 蓝绿色的；绿灰色的；[园艺] 表面起白霜的

sentences.sentence: Aggregate long ellipsoid, 13 cm long, 9 cm in diameter; pericarp with glaucous lenticels.
sentences.translation: 聚合果长椭球形，长达13厘米，直径约9厘米，外果皮有苍白色皮孔。

sentences.sentence: Exception occurred on Glaucous oak with an increase in stem mass ratio under higher light.
sentences.translation: 相对地，对茎、叶部分配比例则减少，惟青刚栎之茎重率有随光量上升而增加的趋势。

sentences.sentence: Plant shrubby, caudex branching, to 50 cm tall or more, 8-15 mm thick, pale green and glaucous above, darker below, leaf scars lenticular.
sentences.translation: 植株灌木型，茎多分枝，可长至50厘米高或更高，茎干8到15毫米粗，淡绿色，有白霜，近根处色深暗，叶痕呈双凸形。
